snippet: President Obama said he would work to reshape the way Americans pay for higher education, though it was unclear precisely what he planned to propose.
lead_paragraph: President Obama said he would work to reshape the way Americans pay for higher education, though it was unclear precisely what he planned to propose.

headline.main: Obama to Offer Plans to Ease Burden of Paying for College
headline.print_headline: Obama to Offer Plans to Ease Burden of Paying for College
